name: avular-packages
postCreateCommand: sudo bash -lc 'sock=/var/run/docker.sock; if [ -S "$sock" ]; then gid=$(stat -c %g "$sock" 2>/dev/null || stat -f %g "$sock"); if ! getent group "$gid" >/dev/null 2>&1; then groupadd -g "$gid" dockersock; fi; group=$(getent group "$gid" | cut -d: -f1); usermod -aG "$group" vscode; fi; mkdir -p /workspaces/avular-packages/out; user_group=$(id -gn vscode 2>/dev/null || echo vscode); chown -R "vscode:${user_group}" /workspaces/avular-packages/out'
